review: I like it but I like my Apple TV more sorry if I could listen to my Audible stories on the fire tv I would be more then happy :)
author: Johnna-rae

review: We were VERY impressed with the Fire TV Stick, after a couple days we ordered another!!!!
author: Patsy Ann

review: I feel in love with it until today, about 2 or 3 weeks after purchasing. Out of nowhere it started freezing every time I tried to press a button. Is this normal? I've been struggling with this thing for a while trying to get it to work right and no luck. There's been no damage to the stick, cord or remote.  And the internet connection is fine so I don't understand why the apps are freezing. I can't even navigate through the home screen. Hopefully this problem doesn't last, then this would definitely be a five star purchase
author: Zhantinique F.

review: Absolutely love this. Im glad I added this to my collection along with my chromecast! Fixing to cut the cord with cable.

review: Made my not so smart tv smarter and more enjoyable.
